briefdescription.para: Managed by AreaDamageManager and its derivatives.

inbodydescription.para: call Leave for all insiders when removing trigger

briefdescription.para: TriggerEvents, pass them on to manager.

detaileddescription.para: Condition whether a TriggerInsider should still be updated or not (checked in update loop and before adding)
Override the TriggerInsider type to be AreaDamageTriggerInsider

briefdescription.para: Update the current TriggerInsider inside the Trigger.
